jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.name: Southern Tide Media
jobs.body:
I currently work as a contract developer for Southern Tide Media.

At Southern Tide Media, My job responsibilities vary from
  • Estimating how much time a project will take, and any technical challenges of the project
  • Setting up a new servers
  • building custom web sites
  • migrating websites to new hosts
  • Server and Web maintenance
  • building custom web sites from scratch
  • building API connectors
  • Use Raven Tools to build SEO reports, make changes as per SEO reports
  • Use Litmus to build HTML emails that look correct in all clients
  • Working with CRM's ( in particular Sharpspring ) to track the users experience on the websites and try to add
    • automated triggers to help market the websites better.
  • Responsive HTML Email Development

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.name: Eagle Web Designs, Inc.
jobs.body: Updated and Developed custom CMS systems for 2 websites during my last time working at Eagle Web Designs,  During my time at EWD I primarily worked on TheNationalTrader.com and brought it to launch. TheNationalTrader.com is a Online Sales Catalog similar to Craigslist that is a 100% custom PHP web applcation, that includes a PayPal payment gateway, a admin panel and a user system with roles.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.name: Self employed Freelancer
jobs.body: I worked as a independant freelancer specializing in large scale CodeIgniter projects and large scale Wordpress projects.  One of my first projects was for a large auto dealership that included a MongoDB to store the car details, and MySQL to store more standard information like user deta, page content, etc.  I also converted a ASP application to Wordpress for American Hiking.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.name: Eagle Web Designs, Inc.
jobs.body: I wrote the custom CMS that is still be used on there client websites to this day, during this time I helped convert there client websites to HTML5 and built a lot of small business websites.

recommendations.name: Nate Crocker
recommendations.title: Director of Multimedia at USAF Chaplain Corps and Owner, StudioP40
recommendations.desc: July 31, 2017, Shawn was a client of Nate’s
recommendations.comment: I have worked with Shawn on several projects ranging from plugin customization to complete website development. Each time Shawn kept in regular contact to provide status updates and made excellent recommendations that saved time and resources to develop. He is a gifted developer and offers more than reasonable pricing.

recommendations.name: Antonel Neculai
recommendations.title: Digital Technologist & Story Teller | PR & Social Marketing Strategist | Entrepreneur | Engineer | NASA Social Alumni
recommendations.desc: July 18, 2016, Antonel was a client of Shawn’s
recommendations.comment: I have worked with Shawn on various projects related to online marketing and web sites for the North Myrtle Beach Chamber of Commerce. Shawn has proved himself to be a very hard working, true professional. His volume of technical knowledge on things related to online marketing, emails, web sites, social channels, programming, and web design is truly impressive. But besides knowledge, Shawn has also displayed the treats of best professionalism, holding very high standards of conduct, communication, and interaction. It is a pleasure collaborating with Shawn and see him relentlessly working on projects until every detail is taken care of and everything is finalized to the best! I am also enchanted by his writing skills, a treat not very often encountered among the ranks of IT professionals and programmers. I strongly recommend Shawn to anyone in need of an excellent professional to take care of projects related to web sites, web programming, web design, social media channels, and email marketing.

recommendations.name: Brandon Evans
recommendations.title: Co-Owner at Southern Tide Media
recommendations.comment: Highly skilled and motivated, Shawn is not only a top notch developer, but he actively looks for improvements that will help clients grown even when that's "not part of the project description", which is a rare trait. In a phrase, Shawn is a talented workaholic.

recommendations.name: Joshua Canfield
recommendations.title: Owner of Code Clarity™ (of Simplify Design®)
recommendations.desc: March 2, 2013, Joshua worked with Shawn but at different companies
recommendations.comment: Shawn is just a wonderful developer. He is ambitious and attentive which is more than important when it comes to programming. He is precise and detail oriented which goes a very long way in this industry.

recommendations.name: Chuck Bunnell
recommendations.title: Web Programmer / Designer at Eagle Web Designs, Inc & Coastal Carolina University
recommendations.desc: November 12, 2012, Chuck was a client of Shawn’s
recommendations.comment: Shawn is not only an excellent high-end programmer, but he has a knack for figuring out how to do the "impossible." He loves the challenge and always comes up with an answer. If you have a website that needs programming changes, Shawn can do it; even when other can't.
